content:
I think there's still some confusion! As I mentioned earlier, there is no LEGO Friends Live Show at the LEGO City Stage at Legoland Windsor. It's possible that you might be thinking of a different theme park or event.

However, I'd be happy to help you with your question about new rides and attractions at Legoland Windsor! Legoland Windsor regularly updates its attractions and events, so it's always a good idea to check their website or mobile app for the latest information.

Some recent additions and popular attractions at Legoland Windsor include:

1. LEGO Mythica: A new themed land featuring rides, shows, and attractions inspired by mythical creatures and legends.
2. Duplo Valley: An area designed for younger kids, with play structures, water play, and rides suitable for little ones.
3. Miniland: A popular area featuring iconic landmarks and scenes made from millions of LEGO bricks.
4. LEGO NINJAGO World: An immersive area with rides, shows, and attractions based on the popular LEGO NINJAGO franchise.

I recommend checking the Legoland Windsor website or mobile app for the most up-to-date information on new attractions, shows, and events during your planned visit. You can also plan your day using their interactive map and schedule to make the most of your time at the park!

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll have a fantastic time at Legoland Windsor with your family!
